item.description:
We need a meeting of those that would like to go to Oshkosh. We know this is last minute, but needs to be looked at ASAP.

Let's meet in the terminal building at 6... If the wx is looking good, we might be fired up and ready to fly someplace to discuss this further.. Ha..

So, bring your ideas, pad and paper and headset.....

If you cannot be there but want to go to OSH with us, send us your ideas or lame excuses please :-)

Matt...
(ha... no really it's Charley)

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: a meeting for OSH trip (and fly??)
